website_summaries.verdict: A multitool for anyone who likes to fix things around the house or who needs tools handy on the go.
pros: TSA friendly, so approved for travel
Includes a bottle opener, pipe, file, screwdriver, ruler, wrench, cutter, bit driver, bike spoke key, and more useful tools
Compact and slim so fit in pockets
cons: Too small to handle more heavy-duty tasks
Some tools are more useful than others

customer_reviews.title: THE ORDER IN WHICH YOU USE THIS TOOL'S CAPABILITIES IS CRITICAL
customer_reviews.text: Excellent in usability and function. High quality tool in every way. Used the pipe and got exceedingly high and built a very sketchy deck with the tool.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C.

customer_reviews.title: This is the key to your future.
customer_reviews.text: With this key no door will be locked to you. No knowledge hidden. You shall become immortal.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Brock

customer_reviews.title: Handy and snazzy
customer_reviews.text: Won't replace anything in your toolbox, but I've gotten a lot of regular use out of it for quick simple tasks that I otherwise would have had to find an appropriate tool for. The smoking bowl and pipe feature is novel and gets a chuckle, but I'd prefer that that space were utilized to add something actually useful.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: one of the best micro tools I've ever bought...and I smoked it!
customer_reviews.text: I am an EDC junkie. I always want to everyday carry something that will get me out of a pickle. With microtools, I often carry two. My world is just an ongoing lab to test which microtools work best. This tool has NEVER been cut from the rotation since I received it. And yes, one of the very first things I did was to roll up a little ball of a nice aromatic pipe tobacco and smoke it. It worked perfectly and was super easy to clean with a standard pipe cleaner. Get this!
customer_reviews.author: krakatoa

customer_reviews.title: Must have for motorcycle riders and carpenters and pretty much anyone lol
customer_reviews.text: So many tools on it for being so small. If your motorcycle rider it can adjust pretty much everything. I'm in the construction field and Anyone that has worked with me since I have got Has offered me way more than what I paid for it. For example work wise every down spout on gutters uses a quarter inch screw so if you don't have that attachment while you're on the ladder you gotta go all the way back down instead I just grab my key chain and use the tool.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Geez
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize this had a built in pipe. Cant use it. Too think and heavy
customer_reviews.author: Janardhana

customer_reviews.title: Another variation on the one-small-tool-for-everything keychain
customer_reviews.text: This was on sale. I like the combination of tools in one. Some are well thought out variants on similar pieces. I use the combination wrench (mm and inch) and the screw driver almost everyday. This finds itself in my hand much more often than the other small tools I've tried previously. The hexagon hole for a bit driver is a nice addition. Bottle cap lifter - necessary. Key shaped - discrete. TSA compliant - perfect. I could live without the pipe. Smoking is bad for your health.
customer_reviews.author: Aoguma

customer_reviews.title: Great product but defected piece
customer_reviews.text: Great product, super useful for small tasks. Unfortunately mine came with a defect on it. Doesn't make any difference to the usability though.
customer_reviews.author: Karan Shah

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is great to carry along if you want to have an on the go multi-tool. I have used it a couple times when given the opportunity, it works great opening cans and bottles and helps when opening boxes. I haven’t gotten around to using the pipe but hopefully I’ll get to try it. However, it is about the size of my finger so it is noticeably bigger than an average key. Not bad per say, but it is something to note and will be quite visible. Overall, it’s a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Strange but handy for the key ring
customer_reviews.text: Don’t use it for much, though it’s come in handle for cutting bandages, zip ties, and cords when I don’t want to full my knife. Screwdriver is functional for larger flatheads, not much for philipshead but that alright, and the stripper and wire bender work oddly well for various pet projects I’ve done in my free time.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Lundy

customer_reviews.title: Great little multi tool but watch your lips!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun multi tool with a added bonus of a hidden bowl. However be careful using the bowl. You can burn yourself very easily. The flame can travel thru the bowl and burn you. I recommend using a wick to light and just tap with the flame and pull the flame away quick. Once you get the hang of it, its easy and a great tool to carry all the time for those quick hits when you aren't home and don't feel like carrying much.
customer_reviews.author: steve betancourt

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for “medicinal” purposes.
customer_reviews.text: What other tool in existence provides the keychain handyman an opportunity to show homage to the herbage? This little gizmo has made this world a better place. You can even get it wet, but probably still shouldn’t feed it after midnight.
customer_reviews.author: Yodamazon.

customer_reviews.title: Took almost 2 months to get
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality! But the head little screwdriver/Phillips doesn’t do reading or sunglasses! Very disappointed! But overall nice quality!
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: Nifty.
customer_reviews.text: I'd just like to point out they used 420 stainless steel...and included a bowl on this multitool. 'tips hat' Well played guys.
customer_reviews.author: pvq

customer_reviews.title: Best one hitter pipe ever made by man
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a handy multitool and simultaneously the best one hitter pipe you'll ever own. It's able to stand up to a lot of wear, it's titanium so your lighter isn't going to destroy it, and the stem is above the bowl so it's perfect for smoking those last few flakes. Just as a discrete one hitter pipe it is already worth it. When you add in that it has a file, screw driver, and a little sharp area to open clamshell packing, it's amazing. 10/10 would buy this again and I probably will just to have another
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Made in India
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of this tool but it’s too expensive for a tool made in India. I like the multi bit screwdriver tip and serrated cutting edge but the pipe is a really stupid idea unless you’re a stoner. Overall it gets four stars.
customer_reviews.author: John Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Impulse buy, so glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.text: I was buying keychains when I stumbled on this and glad I bought it. The item is sturdy, light weight and very nice looking. A buddy of mine that works cutting metal in Australia called it 'sexy' looking design. I have not used much of the features besides the Philips head/screw driver, metric closed wrench, bottle opener and wire stripper and they work as advertised. Great buy to set it in your keychain and forget about it. Blends in with the other keys perfectly only being slightly larger but not much. Was surprised me was its light weight but strong well built multitool.
customer_reviews.author: Aiden

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and so handy, I use it daily
customer_reviews.text: I keep this on my keychain. Not only is the scoring tip useful for opening the throngs of Amazon packages I get regularly, but I end up using the screwdriver part daily. I don't think I'll ever use the tiny bowl it has for smoking pot, but I do love pointing that out to friends. The wrenches have been a little handy, but the built-in spoke wrench is for a pretty tiny gauge spoke. As a guy who works for a bike magazine, this is the only bummer. Everything else is good, I highly recommend this multi-tool, you'll find you use it more often than you think.
customer_reviews.author: T. Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Cool, but...
customer_reviews.text: Cool gadget. Didn't realize it had a pipe. Who would ever really use that? Maybe that's why it cost more. Again, cool gadget, but you can find 'em cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Foster

customer_reviews.title: It's quite the handy little tool!
customer_reviews.text: I gave my wife the Gee Key and she pit it on her keychain. She's learning how to use her Gee Key and she enjoys it when an opportunity presents itself so she can use it. I think everyone should have a Gee Key on their keychain. It's very handy little tool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth carrying, not the most valuable tool.
customer_reviews.text: Good at some things, terrible at others. Screwdriver - utterly useless, but there are other tools for that. (even already on my keychain) Bit Driver - surprisingly useful so far. Spoke Wrench - seriously, why??? (stupid idea) “Tobacco” Pipe - a bit of a novelty, but better than the screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan V.

customer_reviews.title: A little too bulky to add to my key chain
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to be something that i could carry on my key chain, but I find it to be a bit too bulky. I keep it with a couple other items I just feel is a little too bulky for key chain. If I needed it regularly, I bet I would get used to it, but the most frequent usage would be opening boxes for me and I already have a keychain knife that is smaller, so it would just not be used enough to add for my usage compared to space usage in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Pyro

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to build into my key organizer but didn't pay careful attention to size--it's about 50% wider than an actual key and twice as thick. So, a bit disappointed, and while I feel like the seller could've been a little clearer in the listing, it's my fault for assuming I guess? For it's size, I think there are much better alternatives for an edc/pocket multi-tool.
customer_reviews.author: B. K. S.

customer_reviews.title: The Pipe that’s a Tool too!
customer_reviews.text: The Geek tool is a neat little device. I guess the most interesting feature is maybe to pipe! I’m thinking this may have been a primary reason the Geek tool was invented! Great little tool and fun to show your friends!
customer_reviews.author: the skeeker

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my keychain! I have used it several times as a screwdriver and to cut a cord off a wood bundle. The smoking bowl will never be used but never fails to get a laugh. I'd recommend adding some sort of quick release clip though to make it easier to take off and use.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Quality at its best multi tool.
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal, the weight, and quality of this tool is over kill, there are others on Amazon but this is the original. It's a bit expensive but it's definitely worth the price, I will buy this again hopefully this never gets discontinued I will like to buy another one soon. I don't ever want to loose this.
customer_reviews.author: A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very cool multitool
customer_reviews.text: Love this multitool. Everything you need in a pinch, and right with your keys. It's a tad bit heavy and pay attention to the pictures for size comparisons, because it is substantially bigger than a "normal key." Very well made and I have also been using it as a touchpad tool for the ATM and grocery store keypads since COVID-19. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Boozer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfrand the man who has everything and he ended up actually loving it and was proud of how well a gift I hot for him.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix F.

customer_reviews.title: High quality sturdy material
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty! I have used the tip as a screw driver more than anything and it looks the same as the day bought it. Fiddling with the hex was a little tricky but it works. The pipe is funny addition but I don’t see the opening staying open long for extended use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! You won’t regret it
customer_reviews.text: This has been on my person daily since purchasing and has been a lifesaver on many occasions for myself as well as others!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: I does make a  pot pipe, thus the 5 stars :)
customer_reviews.text: Still figuring this thing out. Haven't tried it out for real yet, fortunately.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT GOTSCHALL

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I recomend this for everyone I have used these at less 12 time every sense I got it
customer_reviews.author: mona brock

customer_reviews.title: Was a well-received gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my brother-in-law and he liked it. He enjoyed the pipe feature.
customer_reviews.author: JesseNYC

customer_reviews.title: Tech Key
customer_reviews.text: A key shaped pocket multitool. Chunky and delicious. Fascinatingly novel compared to many other edc. Universally popular conversation piece. Cool as heck. Those are my thoughts. Won't bore me for many many years. Great gift. Thanks me.
customer_reviews.author: Smartphonicus

customer_reviews.title: This tiny tool has many functions and fits on a key chain.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is usually difficult to successfully gift to, however he was delighted with this unique little toy. It is somewhat expensive for what it is, but worth every penny for that wonderful smile.
customer_reviews.author: Boomer

customer_reviews.title: Part of husbands Valentines gift
customer_reviews.text: My husband didn’t think he’d really think he’d use it, but now uses it all the time, and his friends wished they’d be gifted with one, because I guess it’s not something a dad would buy for himself.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Knife doesn't work for anything, isn't even key sized.
customer_reviews.text: Just not a useful supply of mini tools here such as would be found in a standard monitor swiss army knife at all. The knife doesn't work or do anything, it just isn't a practical tool at all.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Great EDC tool
customer_reviews.text: A darn handy little one piece tool that fits on a key ring. With travel it’s one of those few tools that go through the airport. The finger nail file is especially handy on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this tool.
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid, well made mini tool. I purchased this as a stocking stuffer for my husband and was not disappointed. We have tools in the shed, the house, and a few in each car, but I still feel you can't have enough "just in case" items.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Way cool tool!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for friends who will be traveling to Europe this spring. It's TSA compliant. I didn't realize prior to purchasing that one of the "tools" is a pipe but with their 1st stop being Amsterdam, that may come in handy! I wish I would have purchased a whole bunch of these Geekeys because this tool is way to cool!
customer_reviews.author: Elaina Owens

customer_reviews.title: Exceedingly cool.
customer_reviews.text: Easily fits on keychain. Many handy features. Great conversation piece.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Betz

customer_reviews.title: Cool concept.. but..
customer_reviews.text: Too small for the bowl feature to be practical. Unless your everyday bottle opener gets misplaced, this thing is just a gimmick.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Duprey

customer_reviews.title: Not stainless steel, it’s rusting.
customer_reviews.text: Great little key but unfortunately I don’t believe their claim that this is stainless steel because only a month of having this thing and it’s already rusting up.
customer_reviews.author: Deem

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-tool
customer_reviews.text: Love the portability and usability of this device. I have traveled on the airplane twice and no problems with TSA. I have now have six of these for car, house, garage, backpack,etc..
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bman

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: The only critique is that i dont need the tobacco pipe thing cause i dont smoke so maybe another use could have been added. otherwise its great
customer_reviews.author: Tonywolf89

customer_reviews.title: Geeks love these!
customer_reviews.text: Gave those to two of my "geek friends". They really liked them. Sturdy. Loads of things it can do. Cool gift for the geeks in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Smoker65

customer_reviews.title: Best key ever
customer_reviews.text: Love it works for like it's supposed to. Just a little expensive.
customer_reviews.author: dave69

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Durable, effective and extremely functional. It's slightly large than most keys but it blends in perfectly and impresses everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Tweddell

customer_reviews.title: Everything works.
customer_reviews.text: Have tested all the functions (except the bike spoke key and the pipe) without issue. Very durable. Not really the size of a house key, more the size of your car key if you skipped over the product specifications.
customer_reviews.author: W.McG

customer_reviews.title: Useful; always with your keys.
customer_reviews.text: This is a most useful tool because you can carry it with your keys and the tools are useful. Workmanship is first class.
customer_reviews.author: fred paddock

customer_reviews.title: Use it everyday
customer_reviews.text: Its a little pokey in the pocket but I end up using this every day as a box opener, bottle opener, and screw driver. We'll see how the tip holds up after long term usage as a box opener.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew O.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: It is unbelievable that a gadget can be this advanced by performing so so many functions on a tool only slightly larger than a regular key. This is money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Nickels

customer_reviews.title: Great device for those who want to be ready
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful, you never know when you will need something, Phillips screwdriver at DMV, VERY HANDY, Bottle opener, alway useful.
customer_reviews.author: LRS

customer_reviews.title: Read the description fully
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for stocking stuffers during the summer. I thought i thought it would be a great addition to every day carry items for those times when you need a screwdriver etc... When we opened Christmas Stockings my husband said he can’t us it and I asked why, because of the pipe and bowl feature I had completely missed. So this shall be henceforth know as the weed key.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Hurd

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I've abused it a little but there's not a scratch on it... the construction is light weight but extremely strong. Ive used it to pry some stubborn metal boxes open, open some boxes but I have used it as a screwdriver most often. I've not tried the pipe... Maybe one day...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item. Need to Reinforce screwdriver
customer_reviews.text: Works ok. The screw driver is a bit dulled if using to open boxes too ofeten keeping that in mind it’s a great item. Second one
customer_reviews.author: Supergod7

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Key looks great. A bit bigger than my keys but not by much either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great multi tool
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing. Has so many tools to it and its great quality. Has some weight to it. Its a great multi tool to keep on your keys.
customer_reviews.author: AC #1

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. I use it everyday. Solid build. Easy to ise to open boxes with tapes. Usefull little gadget.

customer_reviews.title: HANDY TOOL
customer_reviews.text: ADD TO KEY RING SO ITS ALWAYS AT YOUR FINGERTIP.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The tool to buy for a pot pipe.
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool. It looks like a pocket in every detail but it has a pot pipe hidden in the tools. Pure genius!

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, but I'm keeping it.
customer_reviews.text: Super cool and built well. Excellent machining and finish. I'm keeping this one.

customer_reviews.title: Strong utility key size thingamajiggy
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely better then I thought it would be. It's stronger and actually works well.

customer_reviews.title: Use this every day
customer_reviews.text: I open a lot of packages and need to cut strapping daily. This tool works well and sits in my back pocket every day. I hold a Phillip's head bit in the wrench area using a rubber band. Used that once, but the rubber band makes for a more comfortable grip when I'm opening boxes, etc.

customer_reviews.title: Had been a useful little keychain
customer_reviews.text: This keychain fits in well and is not to bulky. It has been useful opening boxes and I even used it to tighten a loose hex head bolt.

customer_reviews.title: Dude....
customer_reviews.text: The coolest key I own. Burns a bit when you hit. Extremely functional and sturdy.. can’t wait till I really need it.

customer_reviews.title: Slim and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. No issues opening a few cold ones, and great for opening small boxes. Not bulky in the pocket.

customer_reviews.title: Handy little gadget to keep in your pocket!
customer_reviews.text: He loved it! Uses it all the time. It's easy to keep in your pocket. Handy all the time!

customer_reviews.title: Essential!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product way more than I thought I would. Great piece of gear to have!

customer_reviews.text: Good array of tools. Well made. Nice finish, including color. Good EDC on a key ring.

customer_reviews.title: You can put your weed in there.

customer_reviews.title: And bump and a toke!
customer_reviews.text: This key is dope for key bumps, sneaking a toke, and working on small objects or cutting open your next amazon purchase. It’s build quality is superb and it’s built to last.

customer_reviews.title: Tool Good - Careless Packaging - Received Used Item

It also appears that I received a used item because the package was crushed, stapled together, and not intact. I bought this item as a gift so I’m a little disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Do not get it for the bowl
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and useful tool. Bigger than a house key but other than the thickness it is the same size as one of my older car keys. The bowl is not easy to smoke out of. Might be nice in a pinch but it's just not practical.
customer_reviews.author: Ben M.

customer_reviews.title: Good function
customer_reviews.text: Good tools, but a little bit larger than my home key.
customer_reviews.author: hilary

product_meta.title: Geekey Multi-tool – Key shaped pocket tool for your keychain w/bottle opener, screwdriver, ruler, wrench, box cutter, bit driver, file, bike spoke key - stainless steel and TSA friendly.
feature_bullets: Geekey is an innovative, compact multi-tool that expertly combines your go-to tools into one simple device you can carry with you anywhere. It's fully equipped with more than 16+ functions to help you tackle those common, everyday problems, including an innovative metric and imperial sized closed wrench and bit driver for quick fixes, TSA-compliant serrated edge and handy scoring tip, a bike spoke wrench for those off the grid rides, and even a bottle opener.

The smart design of the Geekey Multi-tool is lightweight and compact enough to fit right on your keyring, and crafted from incredibly durable 420 stainless steel that's designed to last through a lifetime of adventures. Created for bikers, outdoor adventurers, handymen, and everyone else looking to always be prepared at a moments notice, Geekey is truly a work of art and engineering that delivers endless capability.

Geekey features include a Smoking Pipe, 3.2/3.3mm Bike Spoke Key, a Screw Driver tip that will fit a #2/3 Slotted, #2 Square Drive, #2/3 Phillips, and #2/3 Combinations (Phillips/Slotted or Phillips/Square) screw all in one bit, Imperial and Metric Closed Wrench, ¼ inch Open Wrench, ¼ inch Bit Driver, Scoring Tip, Serrated Edge, Can Opener, Wire Stripper, File, Imperial and Metric Ruler, Protractor, Bottle Opener, Multi-head fit Driver, and Lanyard Hole.
